name: Depict
description:
Depict is a game that takes the classic drawing and guessing game and adds a twist. Instead of slowly typing out answers everyone can see the puzzle while someone draws and the quicker you guess the more points you accumulate!

It's like Pictionary but much faster, and more fun!

Core Gameplay
  • Pictionary but with knowing what they are drawing… a totally new way to play!
  • Easy matchmaking with friends (and strangers)!
  • Cross platform play across mobile and desktop
  • Log in on multiple devices
  • Friendly bots to play against
  • Fast yet casual game
  • Family friendly fun
  • Huge (and always growing) word/puzzle library
  • Community contributed words/puzzles
  • Express yourself with emotes
  • Reward great drawings
  • Collect achievements
  • Collect awards from other players
  • Community moderated
  • Custom Emote Builder
  • Draw your own Pixel Emotes (Coming Soon)
  • Expanding store of Emotes (Coming Soon)
How to Play

It's easily - just join a game and take turns drawing and guessing! 

Each game consists of two chances for everyone to draw. When drawing pay attention to what else is on the card: Sure, it's easy to draw a "tree", but can you get everyone to guess "tree" and not "cloud", "broccoli", "leaf", or "shrub"? You earn point drawing by how fast others guess and how many people get it right.

To earn points guessing you need to be fast! The quicker you get it right the more points you earn.

Don't just play one game! Your score builds the more games you play and streaks you win. Plus there are lots of achievements to earn while you play!

Give Feedback & Submit Puzzles!

Depict is in early access and we'd love your feedback!

Join us on Discord to contribute words & puzzles for the game, let us know what features you'd like to see, vote on upcoming features, view livestreams of us creating the game, and more.

Why Pixel Art???

We love retro games, but that's not only why Depict is pixely. The game plays best when everyone is drawing and guessing quickly. Keeping the drawings pixely makes the drawer not care as much about what they draw just as long as it conveys the idea. A single blue pixel has won many a "river" puzzle!

Plus, anyone can draw in pixels. It's fun and easy to draw and doesn't matter if you're a 5 year old playing their first drawing game, or a master painter.

Also, by using pixels players can easily customize or draw emotes! We know from Depict v1 emotes are hugely popular and we love seeing the creativity of our players through their emotes!

RoadMap

Currently Depict is in heavy development as we sprint toward a release. We feel that the core gameplay is ironed out and we're ready to start letting other people play the game, join the community, and start providing feedback.

We'll be releasing builds onto this page (and also through the Apple and Android stores. Eventually we'll be bringing it to Steam as well.

Join us on our Discord  to contribute words, help moderate other players, let us know what features you'd like to see, vote on upcoming features, view livestreams of us creating the game, and more.

A Makeshift History

This is not our first game. In fact, this isn't our release of Depict even (check out our original promo video from 2010)! 

We used to be known as MakeShift Games and we had a couple hits on iOS early on. We love our new name and we're making great things. Follow us on Itch (@supernormalgames) and over on our website (SuperNormalGames.com) to get updates.

For this new version of Depict we’re devoted to bringing it to multiple platforms to widen the audience, adding functionality to better engage and expand the community, and improving the design of the game significantly to make the good parts even better.

We know people love this game. We know people become enamored with it – creating fan art, spending hours at a time playing it, and using it to bond with the community as well as friends and family. It's a fantastic game that's fun to play that we think will be even more popular this release!
